mapper.select: SELECT ci.id , ci.card_id , ci.card_img_front , ci.card_img_rear , ci.create_date , ci.modify_date , ci.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = ci.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = ci.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM card_identify ci where ci.status != #{status}
